import React, { useState } from 'react'; import style from "../sass/EditTags.module.scss"; export default function EditTags(props) { // State Declarations const [tags, setTags] = useState([]); function toggleTag(tag) { if ( tags[tag] === true ) setTags[tag](false); else setTags[tag](true); } const axiosInstance = axios.create({ withCredentials: true, }); function onSubmit(e) { axiosInstance } return ( <>
